trans-unit.source: Represents user login information for forms authentication by using client application services.
trans-unit.target: 表示使用客户端应用程序服务进行窗体身份验证的用户登录信息。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.ClientServices.Providers.ClientFormsAuthenticationCredentials> class is used by the <xref:System.Web.ClientServices.Providers.IClientFormsAuthenticationCredentialsProvider> interface.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.ClientServices.Providers.ClientFormsAuthenticationCredentials>类由<xref:System.Web.ClientServices.Providers.IClientFormsAuthenticationCredentialsProvider>接口。

trans-unit.source: When you implement this interface, you must return a populated instance of this class in your <xref:System.Web.ClientServices.Providers.IClientFormsAuthenticationCredentialsProvider.GetCredentials%2A> implementation.
trans-unit.target: 当您实现此接口时，您必须返回中此类的填充的实例你<xref:System.Web.ClientServices.Providers.IClientFormsAuthenticationCredentialsProvider.GetCredentials%2A>实现。

trans-unit.source: The following example code demonstrates how to implement the <xref:System.Web.ClientServices.Providers.IClientFormsAuthenticationCredentialsProvider.GetCredentials%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> method, which returns an instance of this class.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例演示如何实现<xref:System.Web.ClientServices.Providers.IClientFormsAuthenticationCredentialsProvider.GetCredentials%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>方法，返回一个此类的实例。

trans-unit.source: In this example, the <xref:System.Web.ClientServices.Providers.IClientFormsAuthenticationCredentialsProvider.GetCredentials%2A> method is part of a login dialog box class.
trans-unit.target: 在此示例中，<xref:System.Web.ClientServices.Providers.IClientFormsAuthenticationCredentialsProvider.GetCredentials%2A>方法是登录对话框类的一部分。

trans-unit.source: The method displays the dialog box, and then returns a <xref:System.Web.ClientServices.Providers.ClientFormsAuthenticationCredentials> instance initialized with the user-specified values.
trans-unit.target: 该方法显示对话框，，然后返回<xref:System.Web.ClientServices.Providers.ClientFormsAuthenticationCredentials>使用用户指定的值初始化的实例。

trans-unit.source: The user name.
trans-unit.target: 用户名。

trans-unit.source: The user password.
trans-unit.target: 用户密码。

trans-unit.source: A value indicating whether the user credentials should be saved and reused for subsequent login attempts.
trans-unit.target: 一个值，指示是否应保存用户凭据并在后续的登录尝试中重用。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Web.ClientServices.Providers.ClientFormsAuthenticationCredentials" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.Web.ClientServices.Providers.ClientFormsAuthenticationCredentials" /> 类的新实例。

trans-unit.source: You will typically pass user-provided values as the parameters of this constructor.
trans-unit.target: 通常将与此构造函数的参数来传递用户提供的值。

trans-unit.source: The following example code demonstrates how to implement the <xref:System.Web.ClientServices.Providers.IClientFormsAuthenticationCredentialsProvider.GetCredentials%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> method, which returns an instance of this class.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例演示如何实现<xref:System.Web.ClientServices.Providers.IClientFormsAuthenticationCredentialsProvider.GetCredentials%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>方法，返回一个此类的实例。

trans-unit.source: In this example, the <xref:System.Web.ClientServices.Providers.IClientFormsAuthenticationCredentialsProvider.GetCredentials%2A> method is part of a login dialog box class.
trans-unit.target: 在此示例中，<xref:System.Web.ClientServices.Providers.IClientFormsAuthenticationCredentialsProvider.GetCredentials%2A>方法是登录对话框类的一部分。

trans-unit.source: The method displays the dialog box, and then returns a <xref:System.Web.ClientServices.Providers.ClientFormsAuthenticationCredentials> instance initialized with the user-specified values.
trans-unit.target: 该方法显示对话框，，然后返回<xref:System.Web.ClientServices.Providers.ClientFormsAuthenticationCredentials>使用用户指定的值初始化的实例。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the user password.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置用户密码。

trans-unit.source: The user password.
trans-unit.target: 用户密码。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.ClientServices.Providers.ClientFormsAuthenticationMembershipProvider> class uses this property to retrieve the user password during authentication.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.ClientServices.Providers.ClientFormsAuthenticationMembershipProvider>类使用此属性在身份验证期间检索用户密码。

trans-unit.source: You will not typically use this property in your application code.
trans-unit.target: 应用程序代码中不通常将使用此属性。

trans-unit.source: Instead, you will use the class constructor to set the user password.
trans-unit.target: 相反，你将使用类构造函数设置用户密码。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the user credentials should be saved and reused for subsequent login attempts.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示是否应保存用户凭据并在后续的登录尝试中重用。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the credentials should be saved and reused; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果应保存并重用凭据，则为 <see langword="true" />；否则为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.ClientServices.Providers.ClientFormsAuthenticationMembershipProvider> class uses this property during authentication.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.ClientServices.Providers.ClientFormsAuthenticationMembershipProvider>类在身份验证期间使用此属性。

trans-unit.source: You will not typically use this property in your application code.
trans-unit.target: 应用程序代码中不通常将使用此属性。

trans-unit.source: Instead, you will specify a `rememberMe` parameter value in the class constructor.
trans-unit.target: 作为替代，你将指定`rememberMe`在类构造函数的参数值。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the user name.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置用户名。

trans-unit.source: The user name.
trans-unit.target: 用户名。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.ClientServices.Providers.ClientFormsAuthenticationMembershipProvider> class uses this property to retrieve the user name during authentication.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.ClientServices.Providers.ClientFormsAuthenticationMembershipProvider>类使用此属性在身份验证期间检索用户名。

trans-unit.source: You will not typically use this property in your application code.
trans-unit.target: 应用程序代码中不通常将使用此属性。

trans-unit.source: Instead, you will use the class constructor to set the user name.
trans-unit.target: 相反，你将使用类构造函数设置的用户名。
